overview: Meet Josie (Stephanie Swift) a small-town waitress who feels trapped in a thankless job and crappy town. Her life seems meaningless, until she finds herself head over heels in love with the town's bad boy, Jimmy. Jimmy is nothing but trouble, but Josie doesn't care-- she knows that their love is strong enough to conquer all. Who would have ever guessed that finding a guy that can give you the hottest sex you have ever experienced, can turn your life around almost overnight. Join Josie as she discovers the truth and is faced to make a choice that will change her life forever.
tagline: They're running hot. They're running hard. They're running out of time.
title: Roadblock
